abstract: Michael Powell Sports of the Times column recounts his experience, on summer evening at Wrigley Field, watching showdown between surging Chicago Cubs and San Francisco Giants that illuminated rebirth of both franchises as whiff of playoff season tinged air; evoked memories of his boyhood, awake on summer nights in 1969, listening by radio to fierce rivalry between his beloved New York Mets and Chicago's hapless Cubs.
lead_paragraph: The two franchises are experiencing a rebirth, with the Cubs holding the best road record in the National League and the Mets holding the second-best home record.

headline.main: For the Cubs and the Mets, a Whiff of the Past and a Tantalizing Glimpse of the Future
headline.print_headline: A Whiff of the Past, and a Tantalizing Glimpse of the Future

snippet: The two franchises are experiencing a rebirth, with the Cubs holding the best road record in the National League and the Mets holding the second-best home record.
